role.descr: named entity being expressed // gene or gene products//
property of the existing name entity
location refering to organelle, cell or tissue

example.text: A complementary DNA clone encoding the large subunit of the essential mammalian pre-messenger RNA splicing component U2 snRNP auxiliary factor(U2AF65) has been isolated and expressed in vitro.

example.arg: two mRNA isoforms of 2.4 and 4.0 kb

example.text: Northern blotting and reverse transcriptase-PCR assays with oligonucleotide probes and primers specific for each transcript demonstrated that the isoform identical to Ran/TC4 was expressed in both somatic tissues and testis, while the variant form was transcribed only in testis.
RCAS viruses infect only cells engineered to express ectopically the avian retroviral receptor, TVA.

The human mitochondrial transcription termination factor (mTERF) cDNA has been cloned and expressed in vitro, and two alternative precursors of the protein have been imported into isolated mitochondria and processed to the mature protein.
example.arg: The human mitochondrial transcription termination factor (mTERF) cDNA

example.text: The mechanotransduction mechanism for this signalling may directly or indirectly involve the dystrophin complex as dystrophic muscle, unlike normal muscle, is unable to express MGF in response to overload.

example.arg: such cells at the cell surface

example.text: In the cortex of adult animals, Reln is expressed primarily in γ-aminobutyric acid (GABA)ergic neurons and is secreted into perineuronal nets.
T cells from double TCR transgenic mice at the cell surface express only one or the other of the two available TCRs .
example.arg: one or the other of the two available TCRs
T cells from double TCR transgenic mice at the cell surface

example.text: T cells in mice at the cell surface carrying transgenes encoding TCR α and β proteins predominantly express the transgene-encoded TCR proteins.
example.arg: T cells in mice at the cell surface

example.text: This functional allelic exclusion is apparently due to control of the TCR assembly process because these T cells express RNA and protein for all four transgenic TCR proteins.
example.arg: RNA and protein for all four transgenic TCR proteins
